TopicTitle: I didn't want to maintain stability for 10 seconds at Gilly, so I went to another mun...

Articles.Content:
I hope it's okay posting it here...

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/OUlX4)

Lemme get this straight:

You went to Eve, ascended from Eve, and then went to Tylo and landed on Tylo?

I feel inadequate.
Looks like I did ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) It actually helps that I used three different vessels, though (not counting two fuel tankers)
